verbs.description: Rudy Giuliani [V: has] yet to genuinely affect the course of Robert Mueller ’s Russia probe despite being a near - constant presence on TV since he became President Donald Trump ’s lawyer , said current and former officials familiar with the special counsel ’s approach .
